channel.title: Running my server need help
channel.description: Alright i made my server ive done everything the souls guide says everytime i go to run my server under the server file you usually have the black thing come and lets you know that its running but it pops up and disappears real quick how do i fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 05:43:36 pm[/size][hr]can someone please help me??

item.title: Running my server need help
item.dc:creator: @checkmeup checkmeup
item.description:
@checkmeup wrote:

your java is different from whats inside it…

@echo off color 0a title server name here java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

try this… works for me… if not you have to change the java in the code… theres tuts for this

Read full topic
